CustomField.description: Annual household income. Captured for financial eligibility assessment. No automatic calculation - just data capture for review. Format as currency (e.g., 75000.00 for $75,000).
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the annual household income in dollars (e.g., 75000.00 for $75,000). This is used for financial eligibility assessment. Enter numbers only - currency formatting is applied automatically.
CustomField.label: Annual Income
